channel.title: Launch IATI Connect and COPs (Monday November 30th)
channel.description:
Dear Discuss-community,
As you know, on Monday November 30th we will be launching IATI's first Communities of Practice and IATI Connect-platform (which will also provide space for the Discuss-archive and active threads).
Are you ready to Connect? We have 125 registered participants for the launch-event, but registration is still open! Check out our latest animation announcing the COP-launch and how you can register:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I661FrMxmLE&feature=youtu.be
